dict.acceptation: 雨；（热带地区的）雨季，雨天；雨点般降落的东西；<俚>电子流；
（雨）降下，（使）降落；大量地给，（使）大量落下；

sent.orig: Rain reads falling tone, be like rain the rain of my fair cropland.
sent.trans: 雨读作去声，如雨我公田之雨。

sent.orig: Pale moon does rain, red moon does blow,white moon does neither rain nor snow.
sent.trans: 月光灰白，将有雨来，月光泛红，将要刮风，月光银白，无雨无雪。

sent.orig: Rain came on towards noon.( It came on to rain towards noon.)
Facing such rain night, the concern is the immersion in the rain the only mournful thought.
sent.trans: 面对着这样的雨夜，心事是沉浸在雨中唯一的哀思。

sent.orig: I like rain, like any of the rain season.
sent.trans: 我喜欢雨，喜欢任何季节里的雨。
